pages.index: Discover Your Next Adventure with Dreamscape Adventures Home Tours About Contact us Home Tours About Contact us Dreamscape Adventures Discover Your Next Adventure Discover tailored travel experiences with our expert planners. From exotic getaways to family vacations, we turn your dream trips into reality. Our Tours More Our Travel Packages Basic Tour Essential resources for economical travelers, ensuring a smooth and informed journey. Free Information Kit: Maps, destination information, weather guide Customer Support: Access to help via phone or email Online Resources: Access to updated travel tips and highlights Standard Tour A balanced offering combining essential services for a comfortable travel experience. $50 Travel Insurance: Basic coverage Welcome Package: Local SIM card and city guide Guided Tours: One free city tour Deluxe Tour Premium services designed for discerning travelers seeking luxury and convenience. $150 Gourmet Experience: Meals at select top-rated restaurants Enhanced Security: Premium travel insurance and guidelines Luxury Transfers: Private airport transfers Personal Concierge: Assistance with reservations and exclusive access Trusted by Travelers Happy Clients Served 500+ Happy Clients Served 20 Support Available 24/7 Unique Travel Packages 100+ Diverse Travel Styles Adventure Cultural Relaxation Safari Your Dream Adventure Awaits Embark on a journey like no other with Dreamscape Adventures. Discover breathtaking destinations, enriched by immersive cultural experiences and unparalleled personal service. From the mist-covered mountains of the Andes to the vibrant streets of Tokyo, let yourself be captivated by the rich tapestry of humanity and the planet's stunning natural beauty. Each destination offers a deep dive into authenticity, from traditional meals shared with local families to exclusive tours guided by experts who belong to the communities you visit. Experience the unparalleled personal service that Dreamscape Adventures is known for. Our team of professionals is committed to crafting your perfect travel itinerary, filled with tailor-made experiences designed to suit your personal preferences and interests. We pay attention to every detail, big and small, ensuring that your adventure is smooth, exciting, and exactly as you envisioned. So, whether it's sipping a fine wine under the Tuscan sun, learning ancient fishing techniques from the Maori in New Zealand, or capturing the northern lights in Iceland, your journey with us will be filled with moments that are as extraordinary as they are meaningful. Custom Itineraries: Personalized travel plans that cater to your preferences and expectations. Exclusive Experiences: Access to unique activities and locations off the beaten path. Complete Support: Full assistance from planning to return to ensure a hassle-free adventure. Start Your Journey Today Connect with our travel experts to create your perfect trip tailored just for you. Address: A-29, Sanjay Park, Shakarpur, New Delhi, Delhi 110092, India Telephone: +91-9711136997 Email: dreamscape-adventures@gmail.com Get in touch Name Email Message I accept Privacy Policy Send message Get in touch with us to start planning your dream trip! Whether you're looking for a relaxing beach getaway, an adventure-filled expedition, or a cultural city break, our expert travel consultants are here to help. Fill out the form below to request a personalized quote, ask a question, or simply say hello. We can't wait to take you on an unforgettable journey! pages.privacy-policy: PrivacyPolicy | Dreamscape Adventures: Your Gateway to Global Exploration Home Tours About Contact us Home Tours About Contact us Privacy Policy Data Collection Dreamscape Adventures is committed to protecting your privacy. When you access our website or use our travel services, we may collect personal information that you provide directly, such as your name, email address, phone number, payment details, and travel preferences. We may also gather information through automated means, including cookies and similar tracking technologies, regarding your browsing behavior and device. This data helps us personalize your experience, improve our services, and provide you with relevant information and offers. Additionally, we may supplement our records with information from third-party sources to enhance our service quality and customer satisfaction. Usage of Information We utilize the information collected to deliver our travel services, process bookings, handle customer inquiries, and improve your overall experience with Dreamscape Adventures. With your permission, we may also use your information to send you promotional offers, newsletters, and updates about our newest tours and services that may interest you. Furthermore, we analyze customer behavior and preferences to optimize our services, enhance website functionality, and develop new features. Your data also helps us comply with legal requirements and protect the rights of our company and our customers. Information Sharing Dreamscape Adventures does not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information with trusted partners who provide services on our behalf, such as payment processors, booking platforms, and analytics providers. These entities are obligated to protect your information and use it solely for the purposes for which we disclose it. We may also share information with our affiliates and business partners for collaborative marketing efforts. In certain situations, such as legal requirements or mergers and acquisitions, we may disclose your information as necessary. We are dedicated to ensuring that your information is handled with the utmost care and confidentiality. Security Measures At Dreamscape Adventures, we prioritize the security of your personal information. We implement comprehensive security measures, including encryption, secure payment gateways, and regular security audits, to protect against unauthorized access, misuse, or disclosure. Our staff receives continuous training on privacy and data protection best practices to ensure your data is treated with the highest standards of security. Nonetheless, no system can be entirely secure, and we advise you to take precautions such as using strong passwords and protecting your login credentials. If you notice any suspicious activity or have concerns about your data security, please contact us immediately. Your Rights You have specific rights regarding your personal information. You can request access to the data we hold about you, ask for corrections to any inaccuracies, and in certain circumstances, request the deletion of your information. You may also object to or restrict certain types of data processing. To exercise these rights, please contact us using the details below. We will respond to your requests in accordance with applicable data protection laws and strive to address your concerns expediently. Protecting your privacy and ensuring your satisfaction with our services are our top priorities. Privacy Policy Updates From time to time, Dreamscape Adventures may update this privacy policy to reflect changes in our practices or applicable laws. Significant changes will be communicated via a notice on our website or through email, giving you the opportunity to review the updated policy. We encourage you to check this policy periodically to stay informed about how we protect your personal information. Continued use of our services after changes have been posted signifies your acceptance of the updated terms. If you do not agree with any changes, please discontinue using our services and contact us if you have questions or concerns. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns regarding this privacy policy or how Dreamscape Adventures handles your personal information, please reach out to us at dreamscape-adventures@gmail.com. We are committed to resolving your inquiries promptly and assuring that your privacy is protected. Your feedback is essential for us to continuously improve our services and privacy practices. Home Tours About Contact us Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions © Copyright Dreamscape Adventures
pages.terms-conditions: Terms and Conditions | Unforgettable Journeys Await with Dreamscape Adventures Home Tours About Contact us Home Tours About Contact us Terms and Conditions Acceptance of Terms By accessing our website or using our travel services, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions set forth by Dreamscape Adventures. This agreement constitutes a binding contract between you and Dreamscape Adventures. If you do not agree with these terms, please discontinue using our website and services immediately. Your continued use of our platform signifies your acceptance of these terms. We may update or modify these terms periodically, and it is your responsibility to check for updates regularly. Continuing to use our services following any changes indicates your acceptance of those changes. We reserve the right to amend these terms to reflect changes in our operations, legal requirements, or technical advancements. It is crucial to understand and agree to these terms before using our services. Usage Guidelines You are permitted to use our travel services only for lawful purposes. You are responsible for ensuring that all information you submit via our services complies with applicable laws and regulations. You agree not to post or transmit any content that is unlawful, offensive, defamatory, obscene, harmful, or otherwise objectionable. This includes promoting hate speech, discrimination, violence, or any form of harassment. Furthermore, you must not use our services to distribute any malicious software, spam, or engage in phishing activities. We reserve the right to remove any content that violates these terms at our discretion and to terminate your access to our services for any breaches. We stress the importance of respectful and lawful usage of our platform to maintain a safe environment for all users. Intellectual Property Rights All content presented on our website, including text, images, graphics, logos, and software, is the property of Dreamscape Adventures or its licensors and is protected by various intellectual property laws. You must not reproduce, distribute, modify, create derivative works from, or otherwise exploit our content without our explicit written permission. Unauthorized use of our content is prohibited and may result in legal action. By using our site, you acknowledge that Dreamscape Adventures retains all rights, titles, and interests in its content. Any feedback, suggestions, or ideas you provide about our services will become our property, and we may use them without restriction or compensation to you. Respecting our intellectual property rights is essential for the sustainability of our services. Limitation of Liability Dreamscape Adventures is not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from your use or inability to use our website or services. This includes but is not limited to, damages for loss of profits, data, or other intangible losses, even if we have been advised of the possibility of such damages. We do not guarantee that our services will be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free. Your use of our services is at your own risk, and we provide our services "as-is" and "as available." This limitation of liability applies to the fullest extent permitted by law. While we strive to offer high-quality services, it is essential to understand the inherent risks and limitations of using online services. Indemnity Agreement You agree to indemnify and hold harmless Dreamscape Adventures, its affiliates, officers, directors, employees, agents, and licensors from any claims, damages, liabilities, costs, and expenses, including reasonable attorneys' fees, arising from your use of our website or services, your violation of these terms, or your infringement of any intellectual property or other rights of a third party. This indemnification will continue even after you stop using our services. We appreciate your cooperation in ensuring the security and integrity of our platform. Your adherence to these terms helps us provide a reliable and secure service for all users. Jurisdiction and Applicable Law These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which Dreamscape Adventures operates. Any disputes arising from or related to these terms and conditions will fall under the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in that jurisdiction. This includes any disputes regarding the interpretation, breach, or enforcement of these terms. By agreeing to these terms, you consent to the jurisdiction of these courts and waive any objections to venue. We advise you to familiarize yourself with the legal requirements in your jurisdiction to fully understand your rights and obligations under this agreement. Compliance with local laws is crucial for the ethical operation of our services. Modifications to Terms We may revise these terms and conditions from time to time to reflect changes in our services, practices, or legal obligations. If we make significant changes to these terms, we will notify you by posting a notice on our website or sending you an email. We encourage you to review these terms periodically to stay informed about your rights and obligations. Continued use of our services after any changes signifies your acceptance of the updated terms. If you do not agree with the new terms, please stop using our services immediately. Understanding these terms is crucial to maintaining a fair and transparent environment for all users. Contact Information If you have any questions, concerns, or feedback regarding these terms and conditions, please contact us at dreamscape-adventures@gmail.com. We are dedicated to addressing your questions promptly and providing the support you need to have a positive experience. Your feedback helps us improve our services and policies. Thank you for taking the time to read and understand our terms and conditions. We look forward to serving you and appreciate your cooperation in adhering to these terms. Home Tours About Contact us Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions © Copyright Dreamscape Adventures

pages.tours: Tours | Unforgettable Journeys Await with Dreamscape Adventures Home Tours About Contact us Home Tours About Contact us Adventure Trip Cultural City Break Relaxation Getaway Wildlife Safari Find your favourite trip Cairns, Australia A popular destination for snorkeling and diving trips to the Great Barrier Reef, as well as bungee jumping and hiking. From: $1000 Book Queenstown, New Zealand Surrounded by mountains, Queenstown is a hub for outdoor activities like skiing and bungee jumping. From: $1500 Book Jackson Hole, Wyoming A mountain resort town with abundant wildlife and outdoor recreation opportunities in Grand Teton National Park. From: $1200 Book Interlaken, Switzerland A picturesque town between two lakes, perfect for hiking, skiing, and paragliding in the Swiss Alps. From: $1800 Book Paris, France The city of love and lights, home to iconic museums like the Louvre and landmark sites such as the Eiffel Tower and Notre-Dame. From: $1500 Book Kyoto, Japan Experience traditional Japan with visits to ancient temples, stunning gardens, and traditional tea houses. From: $1100 Book Rome, Italy Walk through history with visits to the Colosseum, Vatican City, and the Pantheon in the heart of Rome. From: $900 Book Istanbul, Turkey The cultural melting pot where East meets West, famed for its historical mosques and bustling bazaars. From: $1200 Book Maldives Luxurious overwater bungalows and pristine beaches await in this tropical paradise. From: $3000 Book Bora Bora Crystal-clear waters and stunning coral reefs make Bora Bora a fantastic spot for relaxation and adventure. From: $3500 Book Bali, Indonesia Experience tranquility in Bali’s serene spas and scenic beaches. From: $1800 Book Santorini, Greece Famous for its white-washed buildings and stunning sunsets over the Aegean Sea. From: $2500 Book Serengeti National Park, Tanzania Witness the Great Migration and spot the Big Five in this iconic African safari destination. From: $4000 Book Kruger National Park, South Africa Explore one of Africa’s largest game reserves, known for its diverse wildlife and stunning landscapes. From: $3500 Book Masai Mara, Kenya Experience the breathtaking landscapes and abundant wildlife of the Masai Mara, home to the Great Migration. From: $3700 Book Chobe National Park, Botswana Known for its large herds of elephants and diverse ecosystems, Chobe is a premier safari destination. From: $3800 Book Our team Jordan Brooks Travel Consultant Jordan is an experienced travel consultant at our agency, specializing in creating personalized travel itineraries. Known for their extensive knowledge of global destinations and exquisite customer service, Jordan ensures each trip is tailored to meet the unique preferences of our clients. Their dedication to providing unforgettable travel experiences helps clients explore the world with ease and enjoyment. Alex Morgan Tour Manager Alex is a talented tour manager at our agency, focused on organizing seamless group tours and excursions. With a passion for travel and a meticulous attention to detail, Alex coordinates every aspect of the journey, from logistics to on-ground experiences. Their hands-on approach and commitment to quality ensure that every tour runs smoothly, offering travelers memorable and hassle-free adventures. Feedback From Users 5 out of 5 stars Dreamscape Adventures provided a uniquely personalized itinerary that exceeded all my expectations. Their attention to detail made my trip to Japan unforgettable, from cherry blossom viewing to authentic tea ceremonies. Truly exceptional service! Sophia Martins Graphic Designer 5 out of 5 stars I've traveled with various agencies, but Dreamscape Adventures stands out with their expert knowledge and customer care. My adventure to the Amazon Rainforest was thrilling and impeccably organized. Highly recommended for any adventure seekers! Michael Thompson Software Engineer 5 out of 5 stars Traveling with Dreamscape Adventures to the Arctic was a dream come true. Their commitment to sustainable travel practices made the experience even more rewarding. The guidance and expertise provided made every moment spectacular! Laura Gibson Environmental Scientist Frequently asked questions What types of travel services do you offer? We provide flights, hotels, car rentals, cruises, and customized tour packages to suit your needs and budget. Do you offer travel insurance options? Yes, we offer a range of travel insurance policies to protect you against unforeseen medical, trip cancellation, and travel disruptions. Can I customize my travel itinerary? Absolutely! Our expert travel consultants will work with you to create a personalized itinerary tailored to your preferences, interests, and budget. What payment methods do you accept? We accept all major credit cards, including Visa, Mastercard, and American Express, as well as bank transfers and online payment platforms. How do I receive my travel documents? We'll send you electronic travel documents, including e-tickets and hotel vouchers, via email, or physical documents can be mailed to you upon request.
